item.title: Monarch Tractor preps for layoffs and warns employees it may ‘shut down’
item.description: The memo that went out Thursday, which TechCrunch obtained, says the "timing" of the company's pivot away from tractor manufacturing puts it at risk.

item.title: Trump Takes Aim at State AI Laws in Draft Executive Order
item.description: The draft order, obtained by WIRED, instructs the US Justice Department to sue states that pass laws regulating AI.

item.title: Nvidia CEO Dismisses Concerns of an AI Bubble. Investors Remain Skeptical
item.description: Record sales, a strong financial forecast, and CEO Jensen Huang’s impassioned arguments on his company's earnings call weren’t enough to push Nvidia s...

item.title: NASA Finally Weighs In on the Origin of 3I/ATLAS
item.description: After weeks of silence, NASA has officially dismissed speculation that 3I/ATLAS has anything to do with aliens.

item.title: Google DeepMind Hires Former CTO of Boston Dynamics as the Company Pushes Deeper Into Robotics
item.description: DeepMind’s chief says he envisions Gemini as an operating system for physical robots. The company has hired Aaron Saunders to help make that a reality...
